Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Crack Pipe on Phone Wall
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman lies hobbled in the backseat of a patrol car after kicking the officer in the face. Officers struggle to control an outrageous man. Officers attend to a woman struck by a drunk driver.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV an intoxicated man is placed in isolation after exhibiting combative behavior. In Portland, OR a man wearing a red dress is brought in for trespassing and tells officers that he is in the FBI. In Reno, NV two young men are set straight after stealing a car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 I'm Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: Two men engage in a fist fight on the street over an alleged robbery. A couple claims that they didn’t know the car they are driving is stolen. Occupants of a vehicle claim that all of the contraband found in their car is medical equipment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An attempted pull over results in a foot chase and eventual arrest. An officer makes a drug-related arrest during a routine traffic stop. An officer makes a sizeable drug seizure during a field sobriety check.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A truck driver decides to hide from police in the last place they’ll look: his own house. A man out on a beer run is robbed at knifepoint. In Portland a man decides to go nude for a bike ride.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers enlist the help of a K-9 unit after suspects in a dangerous high-speed chase abandon their car in a residential area. A woman with visible injuries tells the Officer that her husband assaulted her after they left a drive-in. A woman sprays her boyfriend with mace when she sees him with another woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Despite driving a large SUV and trailer, a suspect tries to outrun the police. A driver tries to hide contraband on his person. Police are called into a domestic dispute involving a husband and wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is captured after appearing on an episode of "America's Most Wanted". An Officer detains a man for drug possession. Officers serve a search warrant and find four suspects with narcotics in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E08 You've Gotta Believe Me
programme.desc: A DWI suspect flees from police because he thinks they won’t believe his version of events. A suspect is stopped for jaywalking but when questioned she can’t keep still. A naive man leaves his car unattended for a moment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police arrest a bicycling dealer and his client. Police respond to a call of an unhinged rottweiler. Officers arrest an inebriated man after they spot him grabbing a female bystander.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E06 Sharp Knives and Dirty Donuts
programme.desc: A customer pulls out a knife when asked to leave the store. A man doing donuts in a motel parking lot is questioned about a love triangle. Officers are flagged down by a man who was shot at while riding his bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E28 Slow Mo’ Drag Racer
programme.desc: Officers engage in a bizarre slow-speed chase after a suspect’s failure to stop. A woman is pulled over after leaving a known drug house. An Officer pursues two illegal drag racers on a public highway.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E01 He's the Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: A man wanted for unpaid child support hides from deputies. Officers respond to a sexual predator following a minor. A man with a checkered driving record crashes his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A foot pursuit ends in arrest after a suspected drug dealer attempts to discard his goods. Police are called to a warehouse after the security guard is held at gunpoint. Police assist a young girl after being struck by a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police respond to an emergency call and find a man in dire trouble. Deputies respond to an abusive husband at a local eatery. Two women try to buy narcotics from an undercover deputy during a sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple gets into a fight with their in-laws when they attempt to take their baby on a 3am drive. Two suspects proclaim their innocence after walking away from a hit and run. A man is attacked by his roommate after he gets ‘too friendly’ with a woman in their home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on parole dumps a stolen car and flees from officers on foot. A man denies stealing a wallet from a car with a smashed window. A hostile woman gives officers a false name.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers wrestle an uncooperative driver to the ground after a traffic stop. Deputies search for a man who sent threatening texts to his ex-girlfriend. Two suspects are caught stealing gas.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A couple flees a routine traffic stop. An intoxicated woman climbs a tree. Construction workers are pulled over for a hand-to-hand transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E35 Crooked as a Fish Hook
programme.desc: A reverse drug operation proves successful for officers in both Tampa, FL and Palm Beach County, FL. Officers are in search of a suspect responsible for burglary.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E14 She Needed a Nap
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a man involved in a carjacking. Deputies are called to an altercation between a father and son. Officers respond to an unresponsive woman lying in a roadway.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E26 Pitted Against Each Other
programme.desc: A chase ends after one of the police units disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An enraged pregnant woman attempts to run over her partner. A handcuffed man’s efforts to escape police end in a faceplant. A lying fugitive’s identity is revealed via a fingerprint scanner.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E32 Follow Me to the River
programme.desc: A deputy jumps into a waterway to arrest a fleeing suspect. Officers respond to roommates in an argument. Officers are called after a group of women are attacked.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect flees police in a truck over a misdemeanor traffic warrant. A man denies hitting his wife who has a bloody nose. A man denies ownership of his shorts when deputies find drugs in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have defiantly barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A traffic stop becomes dangerous when the suspect takes off on the interstate. Officers find a large bag of drugs in a man’s pants. Officers respond to a dispute at a familiar location.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police conduct a sting operation. A woman is covered in white powder during a traffic stop. Officers spot a young boy on a bike who wandered away from home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man who ran from police complains that he was not read his rights. Officers detain kids who threw rocks at windowfronts. A paranoid man claims he is being chased by drug dealers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A deputy aids a man who’s fearful of his wife when she drinks. A mom is carted away from the scene of a possible DUI traffic accident. A detective poses as a drug addict in a sting operation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E23 UC Drug Sting II
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect driving a stolen vehicle. A bio-hazard bin an illegal knife and drugs are found during a traffic stop. Agents go undercover in an area known for heavy drug activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Men seeking the services of a prostitute are arrested during a sting operation. New Jersey Police investigate a potential organized attack on a female suspect. Locals detain a man after he’s caught burglarizing property in the area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S20 : E16 Out with a Bang!
programme.desc: Things heat up when a stolen vehicle pursuit reaches a dead end. In a bizarre twist, the complainant of an assault is taken into custody. A daring driver goes out with a bang!

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A prostitute tries to outrun the police during a foot chase. A man claims he can only meet women at motels since he lives with his mom. A prostitute fresh out of jail protests that he’s not trying to return to his old career.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer spots some bizarre PDA and decides to question the lovers. A couple quarrels over the girlfriend’s suspicions that her boyfriend is a loser. A homicide is investigated in a Las Vegas motel.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers hold a man under a car at gunpoint after a traffic stop. Officers are flagged down and directed to a couple arguing on the street. A man apologizes to detectives for the illicit items they find.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers search for a runaway suspect with a weapons charge. A man admits to having a large number of drugs during a traffic stop. Officers respond to a man with a gun in an alley.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Three men are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at an apartment complex. An officer discovers a teenager is dating an older man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are dispatched to an apartment complex where a young girl may have been a victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A repeat offender in Las Vegas attempts an ambitious vertical escape. An officer investigates a domestic call involving an armed male suspect. A driver concealing drugs in his mouth eventually swallows the crack cocaine, but comes clean about his possession.

programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.sub-title: S23 : E22 And Through the Woods
programme.desc: Officers chase a fleeing suspect as he runs through the woods and into a rose bush. An elderly man puts himself in the middle of a knife fight. Two brothers disagree over letting officers search their car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect giving an officer his identification has a change of heart and drives away. It’s not a party in Kansas City unless people are shooting off guns. Officers are called when two suspects are spending hours parked at a Chevron.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are forced to use a taser to subdue a drunk driver. A man is arrested for soliciting prostitution. Officers respond to a complex domestic disturbance call.

programme.desc: Officers search for suspects stealing rims at a car dealership. A married couple claim drugs found in their car were from a nearby ditch. Officers detain an inebriated man arguing with a store clerk.

programme.desc: A distress call involving an intoxicated man results in a struggle and arrest. A driver admits to eating crack moments before a traffic stop. An officer plays one-on-one basketball with local boys.

programme.desc: Police investigate an attempted robbery that turned deadly. Officers enlist a K9 unit to flush out a suspect. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is taken to jail in connection to reports of solicitation. Officers investigate a stolen Escalade. An officer reunites a mother and her 5-year-old son.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers search for suspects stealing rims at a car dealership. A married couple claim drugs found in their car were from a nearby ditch. Officers detain an inebriated man arguing with a store clerk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a call of a man shooting a gun in his front yard. Officers are called to a domestic dispute over a wrinkly infant’s shirt. Four armed and suspicious men are spotted by deputies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Instead of facing the music, a suspect flees from officers down an embankment. A suspect takes a walk through the neighborhood with a BB gun. A innocent pedestrian gets more than she bargained for when she’s hit in a two vehicle collision.

programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues and the suspects are booked for felony, eluding, and drugs.

programme.sub-title: S13 : E34 Fast Pase Foot Chase

programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

programme.title: Michael Bonacini's Christmas at the Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michael Bonacini's Christmas at the Farm
programme.desc: In this heartwarming holiday special, Chef Michael Bonacini invites us to his cozy farmhouse in Ontario for a charming Christmas feast. In this scenic winter retreat, Bonacini interprets classic Welsh and Italian Christmas dishes from his childhood. Michael cooks up comforting dishes from hearty potato leek soup, to succulent roast lamb, to classic molten chocolate lava cake. As he explores homey Christmas flavours, Michael shares his traditions and gives tips for perfecting the holiday meal.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. In this cheerful one-hour special, charming bachelor Spencer takes you through all the planning tips and lets you in on his secrets to create the ultimate holiday meal.

programme.title: BLITZ'N
programme.desc: Get ready for a special holiday BLITZ! with master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she prepares her favorite holiday cocktails and party snacks in the Gusto TV kitchen!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Lot on Your Plate
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen serves up delicious meals for a busy lifestyle from a mouth-watering breakfast burrito to a no-carb cauliflower pizza.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Low Carbs, No Problems
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen shows us low-carb options for any meal of the day. Buckwheat pancakes smothered in blueberries? Yes, please!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen shows us how to add more plants to your plate with a chocolate avocado smoothie, nori rolls, and sweet potato noodles.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen spiralizes zucchini into zoodles to create a balanced, veggie-packed pad thai dish.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores the diversity of the Italian region Calabria by making fresh tuna to hearty pork to a sumptuous orange cake.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The Italian region Campania is known for its seafood and pizza. Famed Chef Michael Bonacini prepares classics like Margherita Pizza and Fried Seafood.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple, fun, and magically tasty, some of Vietnam's most delicious and well-known foods come from its capital city of Hanoi. Vietnamese expert Lisa Nguyen shares her knowledge of Hanoi dishes by starting off with a sweet, sour, and spicy papaya salad called Goi Du Du. With a popular nuoc cham dressing featuring sugar, lime juice and Thai chili drizzled over a medley of crunchy carrots, fresh cilantro and mint, chewy papaya, and shrimp, this dish is the perfect balance of wonderful flavours and textures. Also on the menu, grilled-to-perfection Pork Patties with a rich caramel sauce. Fresh fragrant dill and golden turmeric elevate Lisa's next dish as she cooks up some mahi-mahi to enjoy...

programme.title: Cook Like A Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 Soup Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Join Chef Craig Wong as he teaches us his tricks for building beautiful bowls full of broth and flavour in his celebration of soup.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Vietnam's Love for Noodles
programme.desc: Noodles are a staple in Vietnamese cooking and host Lisa Nguyen showcases their versatility by starting off with fine vermicelli Stuffed Squid. Beautifully grilled and charred, these squid make great finger food. Lisa sticks to stuffing with her next dish - a Vietnamese favourite, Spring Rolls. Crunchy on the outside and filled with soft glass noodles, juicy ground pork, tender shrimp, and delectable crab meat on the inside, you're sure to be salivating at the sight of these tasty creations. Next on the menu, a Crispy Egg Noodle Pillow with a medley of vegetables and sauces on top. Lisa then finishes with a fun seafood and tomato soup; make sure you try the yummy shrimp and delightful...

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Vietnam, Lebanon, China, Germany
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Vietnam - Vietnamese Green Beans, Lebanon - Watermelon Tabbouleh, China - Signapore-Style Spaghetti Squash Noodles, and Germany - Celeriac Sauerbraten and Slaw!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Balancing Sweet with Savoury
programme.desc: A tasty four-course Vietnamese meal using fruit? Yes, please! For her first dish, talented home cook Lisa Nguyen uses tangy tamarind pulp to balance flavours in a savoury bowl of Vietnamese Sour Fish Soup. Then, she combines tart pomelo and sweet pineapple with juicy crab meat for a flavourful salad. Next up, hot Chicken Coconut Curry with a hint of citrusy lemongrass, sweet potatoes, and a kaffir lime leaf. Pair it with a warm, toasty baguette and you're good to go! Lisa's last dish is a mouth-watering, classic Vietnamese dessert. Soft and chewy Steamed Banana Cake drizzled in a sweet velvety coconut sauce crunchy sesame seeds will have you begging for more!

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Vietnamese take-out in just 30 minutes? It's possible! Join chef Spencer Watts in his kitchen as he makes a Vietnamese meal for four that costs around 30 dollars.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: "A" is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin picks the letter “D” in this challenge and combines two very different ingredients – dill and duck! But that’s no big dill for Theresa. For her first dish, Theresa uses dill seeds and weed to make a hearty, creamy dill pickle soup. She adds chicken broth and potatoes as her base but makes the soup extra smooth with some sour cream. She tops the soup with dill pickles to add a delightful crunch. Next, Theresa takes duck, a classic French ingredient, and gives it a French Canadian twist – duck tourtière. Using the duck fat to fry up some veggies, she adds red wine to her chicken stock and simmers the meat. Then, Theresa fills a pie crust with this delightful duck...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Showcasing the unique flavours of endive and eggplant, Chef Lauren Gulyas receives the letter "E" for her cooking challenge. She sets sail by creating an endive salad boat, the perfect delivery vessel for her smoked trout with creÌ€me fraiche, and goat cheese with walnut appetizers. She follows up with a stuffed baby eggplant, Moroccan style! Chef Lauren sauteÌs onion and garlic with some smoky sweet paprika and a snip of savoury sage, the aromatic combination lends itself beautifully to the succulent flavour of lamb. For her grand finale, Chef Lauren prepares the pieÌ€ce de reÌsistance using both endive and eggplant.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: It's all about the letter "S" as Chef Robert Jewell cooks up tasty meals using shrimp and sausage. For his first recipe, Robert fries up turmeric-spiced sweet potato fritters with a shrimp centre. He takes this tantalizing appetizer to another level with a savoury lime soy dipping sauce. Next up, Robert makes an English breakfast strata. This sausage casserole is easily the BEST way to start your day. He layers the bottom of the dish with buttered sourdough slices, before adding crispy fried sausages, leeks and tomatoes. He then covers it in a creamy egg mixture, crumbles stilton on top and bakes it to golden brown. Finally, Robert combines shrimp and sausage into one flavourful dish.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: First up on this episode of Up the Dish is Poppy Sandler's Borscht straight from the Eastern Bloc! A mix of roasted and simmered beets adds complexity to the creamy soup - and don't forget that vivid burgundy hue. Tiera Singh swaps soup for a sandwich with her Beet-Stained Trout Gravlax, pairing the eye-catching seafood with zesty lemon-dill cream cheese and rye pumpernickel bread. Missy Hui's three-layer Red Beet Velvet Cake is a true triple threat. Red beet puree gives this cake its vermillion colour - and pairing it with tangy goat...

programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Garbanzo Beans and Grapefruit
programme.desc: In this fast-paced episode, host Theresa Visintin uses two unlikely ingredients that start with the letter "G," garbanzo beans and grapefruit! First up, Theresa cooks socca, a savoury garbanzo bean pancake recipe, and infuses it with Mediterranean flavours. To make her batter, Theresa combines chickpea flour with salty olives, sweet red pepper, and fresh basil. Once the batter is ready to go, she fries the savoury crepe. Next up, Theresa balances tart grapefruit with a sweet buttery lobster tail. But that's not sweet enough for Theresa! She prepares sabayon, a delicate honey custard that melts in your mouth. Finally, Theresa shows us how to make a mouth-watering dish by combining...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chicken and corn are the key players in this letter “C” challenge. Chef Lauren Gulyas prepares one of her favourite Italian dishes, chicken Marsala. Using garlic, shallots, and white wine, Chef Lauren whips up a rich Marsala sauce that is nutty and floral in flavour. Next, she transforms corn into a creamy polenta topping for her Shepard’s pie...with a twist! Sautéing onion, garlic, and lean ground beef, she uses Worcestershire sauce and tomato paste to give the pie filling an extra flavour boost. Once she finishes those dishes, Chef Lauren creates a mouth-watering recipe that combines both chicken and corn.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kaffir Lime and Kohlrabi
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell has a challenge on his hands after picking the letter “K.” He decides to use ingredients kaffir lime and kohlrabi. First, Robert re-invents the ordinary shrimp skewer, using lemongrass as the skewer (yes, the skewer!). He brings the flavour to the next level with zesty kaffir lime. Using the leaves of the kaffir lime with fresh herbs, Robert makes a dipping sauce for the skewer. Next, Robert fries up salty peameal bacon in one pan and sautés earthy kohlrabi with leeks, potato, and garlic in another. He brings the ingredients together into a single skillet, adding eggs and baking it into a hearty frittata. For his final dish, Robert uses both kaffir lime and kohlrabi in...
